name: Siren Night
description:
Kou and Matthew are classmates that agreed to work on a project for history class together. The two go to Kou's house to work. Due to the project taking a while, Matt agrees to spend the night in Kou's guest room. Everything is normal until a strange music begins to echo around the house. Matt goes missing and Kou's mom is also nowhere to be found. To make matters worse, the music is affecting Kou's memories. He will have to follow clues he left for himself to find where his mom and new friend are before something bad happens to them.

Game made for the Commonplace Book event on rpgmaker.net in October 2021. The prompt given was "Sounds—possibly musical—heard in the night from other worlds or realms of being." The game will have 2 endings and gameplay will be mainly exploration and clue finding. This is meant to be a horror game, so it may not be suitable for all audiences.

Music done by the wonderful Harpoon!
